section.heading: Misdemeanor insurance fraud.
section.text: A person commits the offense of misdemeanor insurance fraud if that person knowingly engages in conduct specified in ยง 22-3225.02 with the intent to defraud or to fraudulently obtain property of another.

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added July 25, 2006, D.C. Law 16-144, ยง 2(c), 53 DCR 2838

annoGroup.heading: Section References
annoGroup.annotation: This section is referenced in ยง 16-801.
